data.text: Monyɛ aso, Ao ɔsoro na mɛkasa!
Me nkyerɛkyerɛ bɛtɔ agu mo so sɛ nsuo;
Mɛbɔ Awurade din;
Ɔyɛ Ɔbotan; nʼadwuma yɛ pɛ;
Nanso wɔayɛ amumuyɛsɛm atia no;
Saa na ɛsɛ sɛ mo ne Awurade di no?
Monkae tete nna;
Ɛberɛ a Ɔsorosoroni kyekyɛɛ nsase maa amanaman,
Ɛfiri sɛ, Israelfoɔ yɛ Awurade dea;
Ɔhunuu wɔn wɔ ɛserɛ asase so
Sɛdeɛ ɔkɔdeɛ hwanyan ne mma,
Awurade nko na ɔkyerɛ wɔn ɛkwan.
Ɔma wɔnante faa nkokoɔ so;
Ɔde anantwie nufosuo mu sradeɛ ne nnwan nufosuo,
Nanso, ankyɛre Yeshurun dɔree sradeɛ yɛɛ ahomasoɔ;
Wɔkanyane ne ninkunutwe, ɛfiri sɛ wɔsomm anyame foforɔ;
Wɔbɔɔ afɔdeɛ maa ahonhom fi, anyame huhuo,
Mopaa Ɔbotan a ɔyɛɛ mo agya no.
Awurade hunuu yei na wɔn ho yɛɛ no nwunu.
Ɔkaa sɛ, “Mɛgya wɔn hɔ;
Wɔde anyame foforɔ som akanyane me ninkuntwe;
Mʼabufuo dɛre sɛ ogya,
“Mɛhɔre amanehunu wɔ wɔn so
Mede ɛkɔm kɛseɛ,
Mmɔntene so no wɔbɛwuwu akofena ano,
Meyɛɛ mʼadwene sɛ mɛbɔ wɔn ahwete
Nanso, mesuroo ɔtamfoɔ fɛdie,
Israel yɛ ɔman a wɔnni adwene.
Ao, sɛ wɔnim nyansa a, anka wɔbɛte yei ase!
Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na onipa baako ataa nnipa apem,
Na wɔn botan nte sɛ yɛn Botan,
Wɔn bobe nyini firi Sodom bobe mu
Wɔn bobesa yɛ awɔ ano borɔ;
“Merekora saa nneɛma yi nyinaa,
Mɛtɔ awere; wɔn a ɛfata wɔn no, ɛbɛtua wɔn so ka.
Awurade bɛbu ne nkurɔfoɔ atɛn
Ɔbɛbisa sɛ, “Afei wɔn anyame no wɔ he,
anyame a wɔdii wɔn afɔrebɔdeɛ mu sradeɛ no
“Afei, monhunu sɛ, me ara me ne no!
Afei, mepagya me nsa kyerɛ soro
Sɛ mese mʼakofena a ɛpa yerɛ yerɛ ano
Mɛma me bɛmma anom mogya abo,
Ao ɔsorosoro, mo ne no nni ahurisie,
Mose ne Nun babarima Hosea baeɛ bɛkaa dwom yi mu nsɛm nyinaa kyerɛɛ nnipa no.
Mose wiee saa dwom no mu nsɛm no ka no,
ɔka kaa ho sɛ, “Momfa nsɛm a maka akyerɛ mo no nyinaa nsie mo akoma mu. Monka nkyerɛ mo mma nso sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛdi emu asɛm biara so sɛ mmara.
Saa nkyerɛkyerɛ yi nyɛ nsɛm bi kwa, ɛyɛ mo nkwa! Sɛ modi so a, mo nkwa nna bɛware wɔ asase a moretwa Asubɔnten Yordan akɔtena so no so.”
Ɛda no ara, Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ,
“Kɔ Moab, kɔ mmepɔ a ɛwɔ asuo no apueeɛ no so, na foro Nebo bepɔ a ɛne Yeriko di nhwɛanim no. To wʼani hwɛ Kanaan asase no, asase a mede rema Israelfoɔ sɛ wɔn agyapadeɛ no.
Ɛhɔ na wobɛwu wɔ bepɔ no so, na woakɔka wʼagyanom ho, sɛdeɛ wo nua Aaron wuu wɔ Hor bepɔ so kɔkaa nʼagyanom ho no.
Ɛfiri sɛ, mo baanu dii me hwammɔ wɔ Israelfoɔ mu wɔ Meriba ne Kades asuo ho wɔ Sin ɛserɛ so. Moanni me kronkronyɛ ho adanseɛ ankyerɛ Israelfoɔ no wɔ hɔ.
Ɛno enti, mobɛhunu asase no afiri akyiri, nanso mo nan rensi asase a mede rema Israelfoɔ no so.”
